name: Nami No Mizu
description:
This is a Game I created for Ludum Dare 35. The Theme was Shapeshift.

The game is set in a living room on an indoor waterfall. You have to transform the wooden Objects to guide the lily to it's pad. But watch out for dangerous objects!

Link to Ludum Dare Submission: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=73451
